name: Chubby Knights
description:
*The game is only open to select people unless you pay the early acess fee in that case you will  have the game until forever.

Long ago, a tale was told of a legendary sandwich, which, once gained by man, could yield unlimited sandwiches to all! While walking to the local sandwich parlor, you notice a sign that reads: Ye Olde Sandwich Shoppe is now closed due to a lacking supply. In a panic you search the whole town for sandwiches, but to no avail. Suddenly, you remember the old tale. As you leave town, many others are embarking as well, on a quest to search for the Legendary Sandwich.
